posts.title: The Role of AI in Modern Credit Risk Management
posts.author:
Anastasiya Shitikova
Marketing Manager @RiskSeal
posts.summary: Here is a concise summary of the text: **Role of AI in Credit Risk Management:** * AI plays a crucial role in credit risk management by analyzing vast amounts of data to identify potential risks and predict outcomes. * Benefits include: + Improved accuracy and efficiency + Enhanced decision-making capabilities + Reduced manual intervention **Key Features of the RiskSeal AI-based Approach:** * Uses machine learning algorithms to analyze large datasets * Identifies high-risk borrowers or transactions * Predicts loan defaults and detects anomalies * Provides personalized risk assessments * Offers real-time monitoring and reporting
posts.excerpt: Learn about the role of AI in credit risk management and its benefits to the lender. Explore the RiskSeal AI-based approach to risk management.

posts.title: How Not to Blow Your Credit Portfolio This Black Friday
posts.author:
Anastasiya Shitikova
Marketing Manager @RiskSeal
posts.summary: Here is a concise summary: **Key Points:** * Lenders can prepare for Black Friday by using alternative data to reduce fraud, improve scoring, and boost approvals. * This includes leveraging non-traditional data sources to gain insights on customers' financial situations. **Important Facts:** * Alternative data sources include: + Social media activity + Online behavior patterns + Customer interactions with online retailers **Pricing Information:** No pricing information is mentioned in the text.
posts.excerpt: Learn how lenders can prepare for Black Friday with alternative data. Reduce fraud, improve scoring, and boost approvals while protecting portfolios.

CEO @RiskSeal
Artem Lalaiants

Artem has over 10 years of experience creating software designed to stop fraud and manage credit risks effectively. His work focused on numerous industries such as entertainment, finance, and gaming industries. 

On the RiskSeal blog, Artem shares his knowledge through straightforward articles, helping digital lenders manage risks. Follow his insights to learn how to identify solvent clients as well as future defaulters.
